title: Notifications are generated for players on Rehab Assignemnt earning MJ stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND create and approve a Rehab Assignment transaction for the same dateAND run the verify stats batch on this player

title: Generated notifications appear for BOC and Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the affected Club's notification widgetAND when I view a different Club's notfication widget (one not affected by the notification item in question)
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears in the BOC's and affected Club's widgetAND does not appear in the non-affected club's widget

title: Only one copy of each notification is generated
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch for MJ stats
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the relevant Clubs notification widget

title: Notifications are generated for players earning stats with a different club (ignoring the past 2 days)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned stats less then 4 days ago and more than 2 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Transfer tx assigning this player to another MN club

AND back-date it so it is on that day

AND approve

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated for that date

title: Notifications are not generated for players that have earned stats with their pending club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned stats less then 4 days ago and more than 2 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Transfer tx assigning this player to another MN club

AND back-date it so it is on that day

AND submit

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for that date

title: Notification is generated when players earns MJ stats without an Active contract for that Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Player Terminates Contract under Paragraph 7(a) transaction for this player

AND date it before the player earned stats

AND approve

AND create a new MJ contract for him with the same club from which he was released

AND date it on the same date as the contract termination

AND push it to Pending Approval state

AND run the Verify Stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated for the date on which the player earned stats but did not have an approved MJ contract

title: Notification is generated when players earn MN stats without an Approved contract for that Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Declare Minor League Free Agent transaction for this player

AND date it before the player earned stats

AND approve

AND create a new contract for him with a different club than he one from which he was released

AND push it to Terms Accepted state

AND run the Verify Stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN notifications are generated stating that the player is playing in the Minor Leagues without an Active Contract

title: Notification is not generated when player is released on the same day he earns stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a Declare Minor League Free Agent transaction for this playerAND date it ON the date player earned statsAND approveAND run the Verify Stats batch on this player

title: No notifications should be generated for stats earned in the Mexican league
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is a player that was part of an Outright to Mexican League
AND is on a Mexican League Club
AND there is a Date on which this player earned stats with the Club this season
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Declare Minor League Free Agency transaction 

AND back-date it so it is before the player earned stats but after the player was assigned to the Mexican League

AND approve the transaction

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for dates on which the player was assigned to the Mexican League

title: No notifications should be generated for stats earned in Post Season or All-Star games
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned post-season stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND run the verify stats batch on this player
